description: First electric VW to be offered through authorised channel packs decent space and plenty of novel features. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: Volkswagen ID4’s appeal strong despite late arrival
title_page: Car review: Volkswagen ID4’s appeal strong despite late arrival | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Volkswagen (VW) has rarely been known to be timely with new product launches here. But the arrival of its electric models takes the cake.
By the time Volkswagen Singapore begins taking pre-sales bookings for its ID4 in September, it would have taken the German manufacturer three years to import the compact electric crossover since it was first unveiled globally.
